## webpack-stats-differ package

A library for generating a diff object between two sets of webpack bundle stat files

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [diff(baselineDir, candidateDir, fileFilter, filter, remoteArtifactManifests)](./webpack-stats-differ.diff.md) | Calculates the diff between two sets of bundle stats |
|  [getFriendlyAssetName(asset)](./webpack-stats-differ.getfriendlyassetname.md) | Returns a readable name of the asset |
